text:
I am also trying to get them to relink the accounts and I will be able to see things again.
I also see these charges on Amex that I am calling about.
Message 2041 of 4024
Please start paying for anything on your iPhone from your own account. You left the family plan for no reason other than perhaps you don’t
understand, but whatever. I don’t want to pay for you twice. Thanks!
Sent:03/10/2024 at 10:25 AM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 03/10/2024 at 10:27 AM)
Subject:Apple Family Plan
Message 2042 of 4024
The BofA is a joint account. I thought you still have access. Let me know how I can help.
Agree I think it’s cobra but they won’t talk to me anymore. I believe they are waiting for the  paperwork I sent you for the refund.
Thank you for looking into this.
Sent:03/10/2024 at 10:27 AM
From:Christine Moyer
To:Robert Moyer (First Viewed: 03/10/2024 at 10:27 AM)
Subject:Re: Business solver
Message 2043 of 4024
I have no issue granting you access or the passwords. We have discussed I think. I also think I sent the paperwork in a while back. Perhaps that is why
Nov is so low. I’ll check to be sure.
Sent:03/10/2024 at 10:29 AM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 03/10/2024 at 10:30 AM)
Subject:Re: Business solver
Message 2044 of 4024
What is left? Happy to do so.
Agree we need a financial plan in place to start looking at separate expenses, child maintenance and spousal support.
I’ll start pulling together docs I have.
Let’s align on docs we need to see our full picture. We will need to share W2’s, tax returns, investment account statements  etc. perhaps we start a
shared drive to compile together then submit to our lawyers. I think I have most of it.
I know we want to be fair on both sides.
Sent:03/10/2024 at 10:30 AM
From:Christine Moyer
To:Robert Moyer (First Viewed: 03/10/2024 at 10:31 AM)
Subject:Re: Apple Family Plan
